DECLARE @RecordCount INT SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(T1.APT_ID) FROM BS_AutoPartsType T1 LEFT JOIN BS_AutoPartsType T2 ON T2.APT_ID = T1.APT_ParentID WHERE 1 = 1
T1.APT_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APT_Name#+'%'
T2.APT_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APT_ParentName#+'%'
T1.APT_IsValid=#WHERE_APT_IsValid#
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount', T1.APT_ID , T1.APT_Name , T1.APT_ParentID , T2.APT_Name 'APT_ParentName' , T1.APT_Index , T1.APT_IsValid , T1.APT_CreatedBy , T1.APT_CreatedTime , T1.APT_UpdatedBy , T1.APT_UpdatedTime , T1.APT_VersionNo , T1.APT_TransID FROM BS_AutoPartsType T1 LEFT JOIN BS_AutoPartsType T2 ON T2.APT_ID = T1.APT_ParentID WHERE 1 = 1
T1.APT_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APT_Name#+'%'
T2.APT_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APT_ParentName#+'%'
T1.APT_IsValid=#WHERE_APT_IsValid#
ORDER BY T1.APT_UpdatedTime DESC
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(T1.APT_ID) FROM BS_AutoPartsType T1 WHERE T1.APT_IsValid = 1 AND T1.APT_ID != #WHERE_APT_ID# AND T1.APT_Name = #WHERE_APT_Name#
SELECT COUNT(T1.APT_ID) FROM BS_AutoPartsType T1 WHERE T1.APT_IsValid = 1 AND ISNULL(T1.APT_ParentID, '') = ''

SELECT DISTINCT T2.APT_Name FROM BS_AutoPartsName T1 INNER JOIN BS_AutoPartsType T2 ON T2.APT_ID = T1.APN_APT_ID AND T2.APT_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.APN_IsValid = 1 AND ISNULL(T1.APN_APT_ID, '') != '' AND #value# LIKE '%' + T1.APN_APT_ID + ';%'
